answers.answer: I am I am in the same position I had undiscovered full blown eclampsia and delivered at 28 weeks I am now 17 weeks. I just follow my doctors orders and try to remain calm. It is something you have no control over and just have to hope and pray for the best.

One miscarriage doesn't increase your odds (miscarriage in general is extremely common and in 99% of cases due to genetic flaws with the child) but the preeclampsia and HELLP is concerning, especially having it as early as you did. Personally I've only read stories from women who get it in later pregnancy. Have you set up any appointments yet?

Yes i go to the doc mon. Last month when i was prego the md wanted to do a 24 hr urine so he would have a base line of my kidney functions. But i miscarried the last wk. My doc with my daughter neglected me and cont to tell me everything was ok. When i got my medical records after my daughter came home i started spilling protein in my urine in dec and found out i was preg in oct!!
And my doc told me i had to come every 2 wks until i made it to 20 wks and every week thereafter to monitor my bp!

I had a miscarriage in the end of November, I didn't have any pain either, I was thankful for that much. But I got pregnant a month later, I didn't even have my period. My midwife told me there was no increased risk of miscarriage because of my previous one. I am now 34 weeks with a healthy baby girl :) It's a bit nerve wracking in the beginning but don't give up hope!
Thats great! Congrats!! My husband and I will never give up hope! We cont to pray daily and we have a good feeling this is our time!!

question: Hi! I had a perfectly normal preg with my 1st child, my second child I delivered at 25 wks d/t pre-eclampsia with heelp syndrome. My daughter survived after 3 months in the NICU. I found out i was preg on july 11th and begam eeding the 12th with no cramps. On july 13th i went to my md amd hvg levels had dropped from 68 to 23, my md said i miscarried, nothing was seen on u/s. I bled approx 4-5 days, nothing heavy amd no cramping. My husband and i had unprotected sex july 26th. On august 6th i took a preg test and it was neg. August 9th i tested positive on 3 preg tests. My husband and I are excited/scared. Am i at increased for another miscarriage and/pre-eclampsia?!?!
title: pregnant after a miscarriage within a month
